ResearchProjectDef.label: felvine sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to sow felvine plants, and process it into a consumable drug. Ingesting felvine has absolutely no effect for most races, however cat-like Lynians recieve quite an empowering high from it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lynian explosives
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft simple explosives at the Lynian crafting spot.
